kannada_original: ನೀನು ಸೋರುವ ಮೂಗು ; ಹೊಳೆವ ಮೂಗುತಿ ಅವನು
english_transliteration: Nīnu sōruva mūgu; hoḷeva mūguti avanu
english_translation: You are the leaking nose; He is the shining nose-ring

kannada_original: ಈ ನೆಲದ ಕೆಸರು ನೀ ; ಅವನು ಚೆಲುಕಮಲ
english_transliteration: Ī nelada kesaru nī; avanu celukamala
english_translation: You are the mud of this earth; He is the beautiful lotus

english_transliteration: Avanu gaganada tāre; nīnondū kiru soḍaru
english_translation: He is the star of the sky; you are a small lamp
Where is the comparison here? – Muddu Rāma.
